text: ape aya akuru lop karala, wisandhi karala ehema ape krameta hada gaththa "pinkantheriya" kiyala.

ape pe්rakshakagaraya me wanawita imahath aaswadayak labamin narambaana aithihasika ho aagamika purawruththayak asuren wruththantha chitha්rapatayak nirmanaya kala yuthuyayi wani ha`gimak da ma sitha thula thibenawa.
thawath laksha panahaka pamana pirisakata widulibala sapayuma binda wati thibenawa.

kese ho sapugaskanda thel piripahaduwa dina kihipayakata wasa damuna da rata thula indhana hingayak athi nowana bawata sahathika wana bawa lanka khanija thel nithigatha sansthawe kalamanakara adhyaksha susantha silwa mahatha kiweya.
ee kale kadawal wala thibuna, dath karkkumata dana olimpik kiyala widuru tiyub ekak.
man diha balan inna eka nawaththanawa!

ee wagema sampa්radayika lebar pakshayata thamange balapadanama raka ganima sandaha wishesha satanak kirimata siduwanu athi bawatath wisheshayenma antha dakshinanshika jathikawadi eksath rajadhaniye swadhina pakshaya ehema nathnam yu.ke.ayi.pi pakshayata salakiya yuthu pirisak chandaya labadenu athi bawatath pa්rakasha wi thibenawa.
ee wagema iridawaka watunoth in pasu elambaena sanduda dinaya niwadu dinayak wenawa.

ohoma dewal wenawa ban..hariyata nan eeta passe dawase bas eka kamp eka issaraha arunta platun ekakinma bada kata pura hambenna oona..aththa kiyanawanan ithin fosas ekekta gahala berenna lesi na kamp ekak ahala pahala nan..man as dekata anuradhapuredi dakka ara goma pata loku aami tata lori dekak kata kapala aawa ..

shri lankawasinta heta (12) sita piyawi asin dhuma kethuwak narambaiya haki bawa kolambaa wishwawidyalaye bhauthika widya adhyayana anshaye mahacharya chandana jayarathna mahatha pawasayi.meya me masa aga dakwa narambaiya haki bawa pawasana ee mahatha heta (12) sita pahadiliwa narambaiya haki bawa da kiya siti..

ohuge kabinat amathiwarun athara wiwidhakara dakshayan rasak sitiyath teliwishan madhyayata mana lesin anugatha wuye (madhya bhara) rajya amathi ha kathanayaka aadi thanathuru daru aanandathissa da alwis.
duwa sandali pranandu, aya dan usas pela sisuwiyak.
me dawas wala 13 weni wyawastha sanshodhanaya ta adala balaya bedima gana godak katha wenawane. 13 kiyanne ashubha ankayak hinda eeka 13+ karanna yanawa kiyala kathawakuth thiyenawa.
wasara siya gananakata perath shri lankawa pawathiye indiyan sagaraye aarthika madhyasthanayak hatiyataya.

eyata goldan layan saha oo si ayi si sammana uleledi wishesha juri sammana himi wiya. 1966 wasaredi amerikawe sinamapataya thiragatha wu athara akadami sammana thunakata da nirdesha wiya.1965 wasaredi thiragatha wu ‘da gretast stori ewar told’ wicharaka, prekshaka agayumata lak nowu sinamapatayaki.jesu thuma gana gethunu sangithamaya sinamapata thunen ekak wanuye ‘godspel’ (1973) sinamapatayayi. 1973 di ‘jisas krayist supar star’ sangithamaya sinamapataya brithanya nirmanayaki.‘da mesiya’ (1975) kithunu wishwasayata wada sahodarathwaya wishayaya karagath sinamapatayaki. 2007 wasaredi da me naminma kithunu sinamapatayak thiragatha wiya.jesu charithaya wata gethunu wishishtama sinamapataya kiya boho denaku salakanne ‘jisas nasarath’ (1977) ya.

thadabala lesa husma ganime apahasuwen pelunu demala katha karana mithuriyak, thaman unu wathura illuwath laba nudun bawath, haki nam eya sapaya dena lesath, ma sinhalayeku nisa owun nosalaka nositina bawath kiwa ya.
sankirna wu samaja kathikawak mewayen janitha wenne deweni ho theweni kiyawimeni.

malesiyawe elayit spidwe dhawana pathayedi pawathi rotaks maks shuratha aasiyanu tharagawaliye awasan tharagaya jayagrahanaya kirimata shri lankawe eshan piris samathwiya.warsha sahitha kalaguna thaththwayak yatathe pawathi mema tharagayedi dhawana pathaya lissana sulu...

marthu 14 wana dina madhyama ratha්ri 12.00 sita ka්riyathmakawana paridi sabaragamuwa wishwawidyalaye siyaluma shishya sangam thahanam kirimata ehi upakulapathiwaraya wisin thiranaya kara atha. 1978 anka 16 darana wishwawidyala panathe 118.1 waganthiya yatathe wishwawidyalaye kirthinamayata hanikara ayurin katayuthu kale yayi chodanakarana baladharin pawasanne maha shishya sangamaya wisin nithi wirodhi raswimak pawathwima me sandaha balapa athi bawayi.

oba sitinne mumbayi wala bawa dakka.

sayipras, dakunu amarikawe wiwidha ratawalwala, nepalaya me yanthrana thiyenawa.
jamanaran leliwala adangu felwanayids molaye pilika saila winasha kirimatath eewa pathirima walakwalimatath upakara we.

indiyawa ha jawa rata wani asalwasi ratawalin ragena aa pirisda boho wuha.

balanna amme shanuka ayiya akka gannawalu.

eeka api diyunuyi apith ee tharaga thula innawaya kiyana ekata labena piliganimak.
ethanadi in ehata wanne mokakda kiyana eka sithata enneth nathuwa athi.
polithin thahanama gana chinaya kriya karannata patan gaththe 2008 wasaredi erata pawathi olimpik krida ulelata samagamiwaya.
raswa siti pirisa amathiwarayata kiyannata wuha.
maks gana pahugiya tikema eka eka thanwala eka eka katha athiwuna.
harithawath parisaraya ape wida niwannata ha kisiyam manasika suwayak athpath kara gannata kisiyam aakarayakin upakari wana nisa ya.
uthura, dakuna, nangenahira, batahira, kandurata yanadi siyalu pradeshayanta ayath janathawa siyalu bedawalin thorawa urenura gati pradarshanaya narambaathi.
meya penenne boho wita handa thibena dinawalatayi.
iwasala inna welawa enakan :)

aanduwa saha siwil sanwidhana niyojithayan athara hatagena thibena matha gatuma nirakaranaya kirima sandaha agamathi ranil wikramasinha idiri dina deka athulatha madihathwimata thiranaya kara athayi wartha we.

yahapath minisa thama sithehi nidan kala yahapath deya da, ayahapath minisa thama sithehi nidan kala ayahapath deya da upadawana bawa shuddha wu bayibalayehi sandahan ya.eheyin, apa sama aramunu kara gatha yuththe yahapath de sithehi nidan kota gena yahapath de ipadawimataya.

api widyawata igenagena thiyanawa shaka thaman thamange jiwaya akhandawa pawathwagena yana pinisa ee parisarayata anuwa hadagahenawa ,anuwarthanaya wenawa kiyala,, gagawal ,kalapu ayine thiyana shaka walata karu mul ,kayiru mul thiyenawa,, maha kanthara wala thiyana gas ,pathok wage eewa thamange jala sanchitha rakaganna..nonasi pawathinna anuwarthanayan wela thiyenawa kiyala ,,kethudhara shaka ,sawana ,,wasiwananthara ,ladu kala oya thanwala hadena gas ee ee parisarayata anuwa hada gahilalu ane manda eeth mata nam me man inna thana ekama parisara sadhaka madde lassanata wawena gastike kola wala ,malwala ,athuwala thiyana wenaskam tika hena pudumayak,,hithagannath baha issara podikale koskolawala yata paththe uda siwiya parissamata ayin karala athkache aran asa deka ridenakal balanawa ,,eeke dilisena kolapata haritha lawa diha ,,dalak wage bedila thiyana eeke apuru salasma diha ,,oyath balanna athi..me gas okkogema kola eka wage thibbanam kisima wadak thiyeyida,, me loke koti ganak shaka wishesha ,wal wishesha thiyenawa ,,eeth eewalin kisima dekak eka wage naha,, mona widiyakin hari wenas ,, poluyi thabiliyi gasdekama ekawage eeth gedi wala ,iratuwala pata wenas ,rasaya wenas ..gammiris koleyi bulath koleyi ekawage eeth suwada wenas ,, hari pudumayi neda ?mata nam hari pudumayi mewuwa mehema une kohomada kiyala.ee wenaskam nothibunanam ..udama thiyena foto eke (alfa rupaya ) mona wage penumak thiyeyida ne ?

wathman yuddha hamuda mandalika pradhani saha shri lanka pabala hamuda rejimenthu adhipathi ewakata karnalwarayeku washayen ese hayiti deshaya bala pitath wu eksath jathinge hamuda shri lanka balaaniye anadena niladhari washayen katayuthu kala athara, ada dina mali deshaya bala pitathwa yamata niyamitha shri lanka hamuda bhata kandaye anadena niladhariwaraya ewakata khandabhara niladhariyeku washayen hayiti bala pitath wu ema prathama shri lankiya hamuda balaaniye kapithanwarayeku washayen rajakarin itukarana ladi.
